description: Search for news articles using various news APIs.

query.info: Keywords or phrases to search for in news articles.

api_key.info: API key for the selected news service (NewsAPI, GNews, or NewsData).

source.info: Select the news API service to use for searching articles.

language.info: Language code for news articles (e.g., 'en' for English, 'zh' for Chinese).

country.info: Country code to filter news articles by geographic region.

category.info: News category to filter articles by topic.

max_results.info: Maximum number of news articles to return (1-100).

days_back.info: Number of days back to search for news articles (1-30).

include_content.info: Whether to include the full article content in the results (if available).

text_key.info: The key to use for the text field in the Data objects (e.g., 'title', 'description', 'content').

errors.missing_api_key: API key is required for news search.
errors.no_results: No news articles found for the given query.
